import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'reactstrap'; import { Button, ButtonGroup, FormGroup, InputGroup, HTMLTable } from '@blueprintjs/core'; import EmployeeTypeOptions from '../../Selects/EmployeeRoleOptions'; import ProjectOptions from '../../Selects/ProjectOptions'; export default class CreateEmployeeForm extends Component { render() { const { onChange, onSubmit, buttonCaption, onClear, name, email, role, project } = this.props; return (
); } } CreateEmployeeForm.defaultProps = { addButtonCaption: 'Add' };
